name: Axelerant
description: Axelerant help digital changemakers make change. Our clients include other agencies, enterprises, and organizations of different shapes and sizes. Our integrated services include Drupal, Acquia, DevOps, Frontend, Quality Engineering, and Consulting. Success management as our service framework operationally is part of who we are at Axelerant. All of our processes and practices are driven by this core, continuously iterated method. What this means is success management teams and success journey mapping for our partners.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: If you’re a digital change maker, we’re your team.
ShortDescription: We help digital changemakers make change.

Highlights.name: Strategy
Highlights.description: We define and implement digital business strategies to navigate industry disruption.

Highlights.name: Design + Build
Highlights.description: Combining human-centered design with software engineering to create aligned products and experiences.

Highlights.name: Grow
Highlights.description: Empowering businesses with insightful content, data-driven decisions, personalized campaigns, and enhanced touchpoints for market growth.

enhanced_description: Axelerant is a technology consulting firm that partners with 'digital changemakers,' including various agencies, enterprises, and organizations, to facilitate digital transformation. Their comprehensive suite of integrated services encompasses digital strategy definition and implementation, human-centered design combined with software engineering for product and experience creation, and strategies for market growth through insightful content, data-driven decisions, and personalized campaigns. Axelerant's technical expertise specifically includes Drupal, Acquia, DevOps, Frontend development, Quality Engineering, and general consulting. A distinguishing aspect of their service delivery is a core, continuously iterated 'success management' framework, which involves dedicated success management teams and success journey mapping for their partners. While providing broad digital transformation services, Axelerant also explicitly addresses HR-related challenges and objectives, such as boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, accelerating the acquisition of top talent, reducing the overall cost of hiring qualified employees, and optimizing the hiring process through automation and data-driven approaches.
key_use_cases: Defining and implementing digital business strategies
Designing and building digital products and experiences
Driving market growth through digital initiatives
Improving hiring manager productivity and confidence
Leveraging data for strategic hiring decisions
competitive_advantages: Integrated service offering covering strategy, design, build, and growth, with expertise in platforms like Drupal and Acquia, DevOps, Frontend, and Quality Engineering
Differentiated 'success management' service framework with continuous iteration and partner journey mapping
implementation_scenarios: Consulting-led implementation of digital business strategies
Software engineering and human-centered design for product and experience development
roi_benefits: Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Enhanced market growth for client businesses
